_comment: ✏️ YOUR SHOP PRODUCTS - Edit this file to add/remove products!
_instructions: Each product needs: id, title, category, price, image. Optional: description, stripeLink, sold
_howToAdd: Copy one of the entries above, paste it, and change the values. Don't forget the comma after the previous entry!
_stripeLink: Create a Payment Link in Stripe dashboard and paste the URL here. Leave empty if not ready to sell yet.
_sold: Set to true when item is sold (for one-of-a-kind originals)
